channel.title: Abouts on Thomas J. Petz, Jr.
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Thomas J. Petz, Jr.

item.title: About
item.description: I have been developing software for a very long time. I learned FORTRAN on punch cards and Z-80 assembler on a TRS-80 Model 1. I cut my teeth professionally on PRIME systems, moving to VAXes and on to Unix workstations. I’ve worked on Cray II’s and 8096 micro controllers. I’m a computer engineer by education and I’ve spent most of my professional career more on the software than hardware side.
